description: A song that Brook used to perform to wake up his old crew, the Rumbar Pirates. He performs it for the Straw Hats, attempting to bring his old traditions to his new crew.

firstUse.context: Brook wakes the Straw Hat crew with this energetic musical number

significance: Represents Brook's attempt to integrate his past traditions with the Rumbar Pirates into his new life with the Straw Hats.
